channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Aakar Shah

item.title: Project 1: Investigating The Movie Database
item.description: This data set contains information about 10,000 movies collected from The Movie Database (TMDb), including user ratings and revenue. I have always been interested in movies and this dataset seems ideal opportunity to combine my love for Movies and Data Analytics. Link to GitHub repository
